A4.text: Swedish is the official language of Sweden and is spoken by the vast majority of the 10.23 million inhabitants of the country.

A5.text: Finnish, a Uralic language, has long been spoken in Sweden (the same holds true for Swedish in Finland, see Finland-Swedes, Åland), as Finland was part of the Swedish kingdom for centuries.

A6.text: Swedish is the sole official national language of Sweden, and one of two in Finland (alongside Finnish).
